text: Rick Ripley was a Republican member of the Montana Legislature. He was elected to Senate District 9, representing Wolf Creek, Montana, in 2009 and 2011. In 2013 and 2015, he represented District 10. He previously served 4 terms in the House of Representatives. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Montana Republicans Category:Montana state senators Category:Members of the Montana House of Representatives Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Rick Ripley
